crackerQuestions.question: Who tries to stop Christmas from coming, by stealing all things of Christmas from “the Who’s”?

options: Double the pig, twice the fun

crackerQuestions.question: What does feliz navidad translate to in English?
options: I feel for my dad in the navy

options: Hit me baby one more time

crackerQuestions.question: In Elf, what is considered the first rule of The Code of Elves?
crackerQuestions.answer: Treat every day like it's Christmas

crackerQuestions.question: What film features the line "I made my family disappear."

jokes.question: What does Santa suffer from if he gets stuck in a chimney?
What kind of motorbike does Santa ride?

jokes.answer: You can always sense his presents!

jokes.question: What do you get if you cross Santa with a duck?

What did Santa say to the smoker?
jokes.answer: Please don't smoke, it's bad for my elf!

jokes.question: What do you call a man who claps at Christmas?
What kind of cars do elves like to drive?
What do elves post on Social Media?
What do you call Rudolph with lots of snow in his ears?
jokes.answer: Anything you want, he can't hear you!

jokes.question: What does Santa clean his hands with?

jokes.answer: I couldn't hear them, so I have snow-idea!
